dcterms:description: The CookingWorld environment tasks agents with preparing meals by following the instructions in a recipe that is provided in the environment. Agents must collect required food ingredients and prepare them according to the recipe.
dcterms:title: CookingWorld

dcterms:creator: K. Murugesan
M. Atzeni
P. Kapaniapathi
P. Shukla
S. Kumaravel
G. Tesauro
K. Talamadupula
M. Sachan
M. Campbell
dcterms:description: TextWorld Commonsense aims to evaluate agents on common sense knowledge that cannot be directly learned from the environment by providing agents a clean-up task where they must place common household objects in their canonical locations.
dcterms:title: TextWorld Commonsense (TWC)

dcterms:creator: X. Yuan
M. A. Côté
A. Sordoni
R. Laroche
R. Tachet des Combes
M. J. Hausknecht
A. Trischler
dcterms:description: The Coin Collector game distills tasks such as object search and environment navigation into a benchmark where an agent must explore rooms to locate and pick up a single coin.
dcterms:title: Coin Collector

dcterms:creator: R. Wang
P. A. Jansen
M. A. Côté
P. Ammanabrolu
dcterms:description: ScienceWorld is a science-domain text game simulator that provides the ability to train and evaluate agents on scientific tasks normally learned by elementary science students.
dcterms:title: ScienceWorld

dcterms:creator: K. Kolve
R. Mottaghi
W. Han
E. Vanderbilt
L. Weihs
A. Herrasti
D. Gordon
Y. Zhu
A. Gupta
A. Farhadi
dcterms:description: AI2THOR is an interactive 3D environment designed for visual AI, allowing agents to interact with a variety of objects in a simulated environment.
dcterms:title: AI2THOR

dcterms:creator: W. H. Guss
B. Houghton
N. Topin
P. Wang
C. Codel
M. Veloso
R. Salakhutdinov
dcterms:description: MINERL is a large-scale dataset of Minecraft demonstrations, providing a rich set of examples for training agents in a Minecraft environment.
dcterms:title: MINERL

dcterms:creator: M. Chevalier-Boisvert
D. Bahdanau
S. Lahlou
L. Willems
C. Saharia
T. H. Nguyen
Y. Bengio
dcterms:description: BABYAI is a dataset designed for grounded language learning with a human in the loop, focusing on teaching agents to understand and execute language instructions.
dcterms:title: BABYAI

dcterms:creator: H. Küttler
N. Nardelli
A. Miller
R. Raileanu
M. Selvatici
E. Grefenstette
T. Rocktäschel
dcterms:description: NETHACK is a learning environment based on the classic game Nethack, providing a rich setting for training agents in complex decision-making tasks.
dcterms:title: NETHACK

dcterms:creator: A. Petrenko
E. Wijmans
B. Shacklett
V. Koltun
dcterms:description: MEGAVERSE is a simulation environment designed for embodied agents, allowing for high-speed simulations at one million experiences per second.
dcterms:title: MEGAVERSE

dcterms:creator: M. A. Côté
Á. Kádár
X. Yuan
B. A. Kybartas
T. Barnes
E. Fine
J. Moore
M. J. Hausknecht
L. El Asri

W. Tay
A. Trischler
dcterms:description: TEXTWORLD is a learning environment for text-based games, providing a framework for generating parametric text games for natural language processing research.
dcterms:title: TEXTWORLD
